executable.title: Calculate SUV Image
executable.description: Calculate Standardized Uptake Value (SUV) image from a input PET image of radioactivity

string-enumeration.name: inputUnits
string-enumeration.description:
The radioactivity units in the input PET image:
nCi_cc (nCi/cm3)
Bq_cc (Bq/cm3)
kBq_cc (kBq/cm3)
string-enumeration.label: Input Volume Units:

double.name: IDMbq
double.label: Injected radioactivity dose (MBq):
double.description: The injected radioactivity dose in MBq units

double.name: bodyWeightkg
double.label: Body weight (kg):
double.description: The body weight of the subject in kg

string-enumeration.name: outputScalarType
string-enumeration.description:
The scalar data type for the output SUV volume:
same (same as the input image)
float32 (32-bit floating point)
float64 (64-bit floating point)
string-enumeration.label: Output scalar type:
